title: Foundations of ghost stability
authors: Ver\'onica Errasti D\'iez, Jordi Gaset Rif\`a, Georgina Staudt
abstract:
We present a new method to analytically prove global stability in
ghost-ridden dynamical systems. Our proposal encompasses all prior results and
consequentially extends them. In particular, we show that stability can follow
from a conserved quantity that is unbounded from below, contrary to
expectation. Novel examples illustrate all our results. Our findings take root
on a careful examination of the literature, here comprehensively reviewed for
the first time. This work lays the mathematical basis for ulterior extensions
to field theory and quantization, and it constitutes a gateway for
inter-disciplinary research in dynamics and integrability.
